headline: Criticism Stifled in a Boeing Crash
abstract: A study that blasted Boeing after a 2009 accident was never made public. Other criticisms were tempered by investigators after the company and U.S. safety officials objected.
lead_paragraph: After a Boeing 737 crashed near Amsterdam more than a decade ago, the Dutch investigators focused blame on the pilots for failing to react properly when an automated system malfunctioned and caused the plane to plummet into a field, killing nine people.
keywords: Boeing 737 Max Groundings and Safety Concerns (2019)
